title: Travellers' tales: survey south
brief_description: Shows the scientific survey of the South Sandwich Islands carried out by the British Antarctic Survey expedition and the Royal Navy in 1964. Includes aspects of the zoological, botanical and surveying work undertaken.
description: Shows the scientific survey of the South Sandwich Islands carried out by the British Antarctic Survey expedition and the Royal Navy in 1964. Includes aspects of the zoological, botanical and surveying work undertaken.
